short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate easy to remember and secure Passwords!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure Passwords are pretty important these days. We generate readable Passwords that are easy to remember but because they are no real Words, they are considered pretty Safe!
